edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: now another red diagonal to that

edus.text: so it's in line with the first
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: now one directly to the left of hte last one you placed

edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: on the far side of the purple
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: then a row of four starting one diagonal from the top blue
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: now make the same ear piece
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: should i just mirror the first one?
edus.speaker: Builder

edus.text: put a red block 6 to the right and 3 up
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: then one block diagonal to that one to the left and away from you
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: then another diagonal block away from you and to the right
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: and then one more red block away from you from the last block you put down
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: diagonal again one block to the right and away from you
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: then put a purple block on top of the last block you just put down
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: one on the face towards you
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: and away from you on that purple block
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: that is the bottom row of a 3 wide 3 tall purple wall
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: put an orange block down on the side facing you
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: use that to make a plus across the purple wall
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: on the top middle purple block,
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: put a column of 2 blue blocks
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: one block diagonally up and away from you,
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: so copy everything again to close off the design
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: u need 2 more blue blocks on top
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: then place a yellow block in front of you
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: then place a yellow block behind it
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: and then a yellow block on top of it
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: and then get rid of the yellow block on the ground
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: pl then 4 spaces to the left of the top yellow block
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: put a red block on the ground
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: then to the right of that block,
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: should i put it one space closer to he yellow?
edus.speaker: Builder

edus.text: then put a red block in front of the one you just placed
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: and then put another red block on top of it
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: then u can get rid of the red block underneath it
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: and then get rid of the corner red block
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: so it's like a diagonal staircase right
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: so the 2nd to last red step
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: put an orange block on the ground
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: then put another orange block on top of it
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: then get rid of the orange block on the floor
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: then add a diagonal step to the top right
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: this one takes the whole width of the board
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: place one block floating above two invisible blocks
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: On top of the red one I placed?
edus.speaker: Builder

edus.text: the whole structure is one the same plane
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: do the same thing next to it
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: now as if standing on that last block
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: add a step goind towards the right
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: remember its all in the same plane
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: so now add two blocks on top of the last step
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: another step up from the tallest block

edus.text: using the last block as the top of the tower,
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: add four more blocks making a tower of 5

edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: now make that last step a tower of 3
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: and finally a step up and step down
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: first build a 3x3 red platform floating 1 block off the ground
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: now build an oraneg border to the platform that is going diagonally from it up and away
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: now place a green block on the red platform in 2 corners on the right
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: now in the far corner with a green block
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: place another green above where the orange corner block used to be
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: now place another one going diagoanlly up and away from it in the same direction
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: now on the other corner with a green block
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: place a green block going away from it diagonally up and to the right
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: now place another up and to the right of that
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: so this figure is encased in a 4*4*2 block
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: start with a yellow block on the ground
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: and place another yellow to the left

edus.text: place a green one above the ground

edus.text: up and left of that yellow block on the right,

edus.text: now kep one space above both yellow blocks

edus.text: now one up to the right

edus.text: now two on top of that

edus.text: now one up and to the right

edus.text: put down a row of 7 red blocks
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: then an orange on one end
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: then another one diagonally upwards and to the left

edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: now one purple between the two top orange blocks
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: then a row of two purple blocks going left

edus.text: and starting from the top of the block you just placed

edus.text: so, this structure is gonna be all red blocks,
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: start with a stack of 6 red blocks near the center
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: now put another block next to the bottom one
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: make a stack of 4 blocks next to that
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: in front of the single block.
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: all the blocks are in the same 2d plane
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: remove the bottom block from both stacks,
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: but leave the single one on the ground
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: now, starting with the shorter stack,
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: you want a block one tile above and to the left of the top of the stack
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: and another block one tile below and to the left of that
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: now moving on to the taller stack,

edus.text: and another one below and to the right

edus.text: and another one below and to the right

edus.text: we have yet another complicated structure.
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: i will need a moment to look it over
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: just give me instructions when you are ready.
edus.speaker: Builder

edus.text: we will start by using blue blocks.
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: please start 1 square from the left side.
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: we need to make a U shaped structure,
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: but as if it were turned 90 degrees to the right
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: this will actually be a rectangle.
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: we need 2 more blue blocks going horizontally
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: and finish it off by filling in the rectangle
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: 2 more on the upper and lower part, i mean
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: so that it is 4 across please.
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: this orientation is correct i believe
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: now we just need to fill in that last piece
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: actually that is a little too far.
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: we just need that middle block shifted to the left
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: and to remove the other 2 ones you just placed
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: it should be a 3x4 open rectangle
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: what do you mean shifted to the left?
edus.speaker: Builder

edus.text: there should be 2 open spaces in this rectangle
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: it should end on the 4th block
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: so re move the other 2 blue blocks at the end?
edus.speaker: Builder

edus.text: i will refer to this shape as r-windows from here on out.
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: we need to make 3 more of them in different colors.
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: the tricky part is they will all be interlinked.
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: lets move on to the green one
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: please place the first green block in the right open space of the blue r-window
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: some of them are oriented differently,
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: but shifted up as if it were the second layer.
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: we need this green one to be flat though.
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: if you can shift it 90 degrees to the right
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: one moment while i examine the strcuture
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: next we need a purple r-window.
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: it should be interlinked with the green
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: it might have been easier to describe the two windows first
edus.speaker: Builder

edus.text: i will try to do better in the future.
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: and oriented like the green one (flat).
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: it should be interlinked with the purple r-window.
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: it should extend to the left from where you are now
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: please allow a moment to inspect the full structure
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: i do believe we have successfully completed our mission.
edus.speaker: Architect
